description: Multi-objective optimization problems requiring system-level thinking

problems.prompt: Design a half-bridge converter for stellarator coil power supply. Input: 6000V DC, Output: 500V at 10kA for superconducting coil. Must achieve 10ppm current stability, handle quench protection, and provide 24/7 operation with plasma experiments.

Design a buck converter for dilution refrigerator mixing chamber heater. Input: 12V, Output: 100mV at 10mA for thermometry calibration. Must achieve <1μK temperature stability, <100pV/√Hz electrical noise, and operate at 10mK base temperature (electronics at room temp).

Design a flyback converter for through-the-earth (TTE) emergency communication system. Input: 24V UPS, Output: 200V at 5A peak for ELF transmitter. Must penetrate 500m of rock, operate in coal dust atmosphere (ATEX), and provide 8-hour emergency broadcast.

Design a full-bridge converter for lead-glass electromagnetic calorimeter PMT array. Input: 380V AC rectified (540V DC), Output: 48V at 50A for 1000 PMT base boards. Must handle high radiation environment (1Mrad TID), survive beam-induced EMI, and provide stable voltage during collisions.

Design a boost converter for electric aircraft emergency power system. Input: 270V from main battery during emergency, Output: 540V DC bus at 50kW for critical flight systems. Must provide 30 minutes emergency power, handle rapid altitude descent (cabin pressure change), and meet DO-160G.

Design a Ćuk converter for geophysical magnetotelluric survey equipment. Input: 12V battery, Output: -48V at 2A for magnetic sensor preamplifiers. Must achieve <1pT magnetic noise floor, operate in remote wilderness, and provide 24-hour survey capability.

Design a forward converter for lunar surface rover. Input: 28V from RTG/battery hybrid, Output: 12V at 20A for electronics and motors. Must survive 300K lunar day/night thermal swing, handle lunar dust contamination, and operate for 10+ year mission.

Design a SEPIC converter for drifting ocean buoy sensor package. Input: 3V-6V from wave energy harvester, Output: 5V at 200mA for sensors and satellite transmitter. Must survive years of ocean deployment, handle constant wave motion, and resist biofouling.

Design a half-bridge converter for MRI gradient coil amplifier. Input: 600V DC, Output: ±400V at 300A for gradient coil. Must achieve 2T/m gradient strength, <1μs rise time, and operate continuously during scans without patient acoustic disturbance.

Design a buck converter for exascale supercomputer CPU power delivery. Input: 48V rack distribution, Output: 0.7V at 1000A for GPU compute die. Must achieve 1mΩ total power path, <1μs transient response, and fit within GPU interposer constraints.
